summary: This document outlines the addition of beneficiaries to the Butterfly Trust, established by Jeffrey E. Epstein. It details the roles of the trustees, Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn, and includes signatures from current acting trustees Harry I. Beller and Erika A. Kellerhals, confirming their authority to add beneficiaries under the trust agreement.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is identified as the Grantor of the Butterfly Trust, which he established.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Indyke is named as one of the trustees of the Butterfly Trust, responsible for managing the trust's assets.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Kahn is also identified as a trustee of the Butterfly Trust, alongside Indyke.

persons.name: Harry I. Beller
persons.context: Beller is mentioned as a current acting trustee of the Butterfly Trust, involved in adding beneficiaries.

persons.name: Erika A. Kellerhals
persons.context: Kellerhals is noted as a current acting trustee of the Butterfly Trust, participating in the addition of beneficiaries.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Maxwell is mentioned as a beneficiary who is being deleted from the trust.

persons.name: Karyna Shuliak
persons.context: Shuliak is mentioned as a new beneficiary being added to the trust.

connections.description: Epstein is the Grantor of the trust, while Indyke serves as a trustee.
Epstein is the Grantor of the trust, and Kahn is a trustee managing the trust.
Indyke and Kahn are both trustees of the Butterfly Trust, working together.
Beller and Kellerhals are current acting trustees of the Butterfly Trust.
Beller acts as a trustee under Epstein's trust agreement.
Kellerhals serves as a trustee under Epstein's trust agreement.
Maxwell is a beneficiary being removed from the trust by Beller and Kellerhals.
Shuliak is a new beneficiary being added to the trust by Beller and Kellerhals.

events.title: Addition of Beneficiaries to Butterfly Trust
events.description: Harry I. Beller and Erika A. Kellerhals, acting as trustees, add new beneficiaries to the Butterfly Trust.

events.title: Deletion of Ghislaine Maxwell as Beneficiary
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell is removed as a beneficiary from the Butterfly Trust.

events.title: Addition of Karyna Shuliak as Beneficiary
events.description: Karyna Shuliak is added as a new beneficiary to the Butterfly Trust.

keyFacts: The Butterfly Trust was established by Jeffrey E. Epstein on December 27, 2006.
Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn are named as trustees of the Butterfly Trust.
Harry I. Beller and Erika A. Kellerhals are current acting trustees involved in adding beneficiaries.
Ghislaine Maxwell is being removed as a beneficiary from the trust.
Karyna Shuliak is being added as a new beneficiary to the trust.
